short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Phishing alerts for Banking &other fake news media. Reach out LegitGreenCheck@gmail.com for customizations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Phishing, Identity theft, online scams - this is the tool you need. This tool identifies all banking sites that are US Based. It covers over 98% of total assets in US and over 99.9% of all bank accounts. So if you click on scam links, you will see notifications...

There are lot of FAKE NEWS websites. With elections, there would be tons of fake news sites that will spring up. This tool categorizes almost all news sites, including satirical sites. 

If you have feedback please respond to LegitGreenCheck@gmail.com
We can customize this tool for your organization so your organization is extra vigilant. Please reach out to us.
This tool helps the vulnerable and anyone is, given how deceptive ads and emails could be. I will do my best to keep this updated. 
Please DONATE :)

The images are shown for sites like BankOfAmerica Banking site, Mail.Ru- foreign website, IRS.gov for legitimate website (scammers could send you link to fake look-alike website to collect your personal data) and a school website.
